original: Mahāpaṇṇāsaka🔽Cuddasamavagga🔽Pariyuṭṭhānaṁcittavippayuttantikathā🔽Pariyuṭṭhānaṁ cittavippayuttanti?🔽Āmantā.🔽Rūpaṁ nibbānaṁ cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe…🔽phoṭṭhabbāyatananti?🔽Na hevaṁ vattabbe …pe…🔽pariyuṭṭhānaṁ cittavippayuttanti?🔽Āmantā.🔽Natthi sarāgaṁ cittaṁ sadosaṁ cittaṁ samohaṁ cittaṁ …pe…
analyzed: mahāpaṇṇāsaka  cud dasama vagga           pariyuṭṭhānam citta vippayuttan ti  āmantā  rūpam nibbānam cakkhu āyatanam pe  phoṭṭhabba āyatanam ti  na ha ivam vattabbe pe  pariyuṭṭhānam citta vippayuttan ti  āmantā  natthi sa rāgam cittam sa dosam cittam sa moham cittam pe
translated: The Fourteenth Section🔽The Discussion of Obstruction Unconnected with the Mind

original: akusalaṁ cittaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ cittanti?🔽Na hevaṁ vattabbe …pe…🔽nanu atthi sarāgaṁ cittaṁ sadosaṁ cittaṁ samohaṁ cittaṁ …pe…🔽akusalaṁ cittaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ cittanti?
analyzed: akusalam cittam saṅkiliṭṭham cittan ti  na ha ivam vattabbe pe  nanu atthi sa rāgam cittam sa dosam cittam sa moham cittam pe  akusalam cittam saṅkiliṭṭham cittan ti
translated: Is obstruction unconnected with the mind?

original: Āmantā.🔽Hañci atthi sarāgaṁ cittaṁ sadosaṁ cittaṁ samohaṁ cittaṁ …pe…🔽akusalaṁ cittaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—🔽“pariyuṭṭhānaṁ cittavippayuttan”ti.
analyzed: āmantā  hañci atthi sa rāgam cittam sa dosam cittam sa moham cittam pe  akusalam cittam saṅkiliṭṭham citta no ca vata re vattabbe  pariyuṭṭhānam citta vippayuttan ti
pariyuṭṭhānam citta vippayutta anti kathā niṭṭhitā
